landing.subtitle: See fine-fine Ankara pattern dem and how dem dey do am.
landing.beforeChatting: Before you fit chat, make you signup or login

about.title: About Ankara Learning
about.platformDescription: platform wey dem create to teach, keep, and celebrate di beauty of Ankara prints. Ankara cloth no be just fashion; e represent culture, identity, creativity, and history for many African communities.
about.goal: Our goal na to make learning about Ankara easy, interesting, and accessible to everybody ‚Äî from beginners wey just dey discover African prints to advanced learners wey want master styling, design, and cultural knowledge.
about.history: Di history and origin of Ankara fabrics
about.meanings: Wetin popular Ankara patterns and symbols mean
about.usage: How dem dey use Ankara for fashion and modern design
about.culturalSignificance: Di cultural importance of Ankara across Africa
about.tradition: We combine tradition with technology by using interactive learning system to guide you step by step. Whether you dey learn for fashion, business, or cultural knowledge, dis platform go help you grow with confidence.
about.passion: Ankara Learning na built with passion for African creativity and digital education. We believe say culture suppose dey share, understand, and appreciate globally.
about.tagline: Celebrate Culture. Learn Creativity. Wear Your Story.

contact.title: Kontakt Us
contact.description: We go like hear from you! Whether you get questions about Ankara learning, fashion, culture, or collaboration, feel free to reach out.
contact.name: Name
contact.response: We dey try respond quick-quick. Thank you for being part of di Ankara Learning community ‚ù§Ô∏è
